title: Tulsa Tough: Miami Nights’ Andrea Cyr, DNA’s Kim Lucie, and ACG’s Danny Summerhill extend their leads in the American Criterium Cup
content:
The racers are looking ahead to race number 4 of the series at the Tour of America's Dairyland this weekend.

Read the full article at  Tulsa Tough: Miami Nights’ Andrea Cyr, DNA’s Kim Lucie, and ACG’s Danny Summerhill extend their leads in the American Criterium Cup on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
